SNMP Sonicwall 4600

Available versions


  • ver. 5.0
  • ver. 5.4


SNMP Sonicwall 4600

Overview

This will work on NSA 3x00 and 4x00 series firewalls. Derive form the 3600/400 one that is in Portuguese. This one is in English.

Macros used

There are no macros links in this template.

Template links

There are no template links in this template.

Discovery rules

|Name|Description|Type|Key and additional info| |—-|———–|—-|—-| |Interfaces |<p>-</p>|SNMP agent|sonicwallifDescr<p>Update: 90</p>|

Items collected

|Name|Description|Type|Key and additional info| |—-|———–|—-|—-| |Firmware Version|<p>-</p>|SNMP agent|SysmFirmwareVersion<p>Update: 3600</p>| |Current Connections|<p>-</p>|SNMP agent|sonicwallCurrentConnections<p>Update: 60</p>| |Sonicwall Model|<p>-</p>|SNMP agent|SysmModel<p>Update: 3600</p>| |Current RAM Usage|<p>-</p>|SNMP agent|sonicwallCurrentRAMUtil<p>Update: 60</p>| |Sonicwall Serial Number|<p>-</p>|SNMP agent|SysmSerialNumber<p>Update: 3600</p>| |Current CPU Util|<p>-</p>|SNMP agent|sonicwallCurrentCPUUtil<p>Update: 60</p>| |Incoming Traffic on interface $1|<p>-</p>|SNMP agent|ifInOctets.[{#SNMPVALUE}]<p>Update: 30</p><p>LLD</p>| |Outgoing Traffic on interface $1|<p>-</p>|SNMP agent|ifOutOctets.[{#SNMPVALUE}]<p>Update: 30</p><p>LLD</p>|

Triggers

There are no triggers in this template.
